title: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and
context: [ยง425E-1203] Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.**** This chapter modifies, limits, or supersedes the federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, Title 15 United States Code section 7001 et seq.; provided that this chapter does not modify, limit, or supersede section 101&copy; of that Act or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in section 103(b) of that Act. [L 2003, c 210, pt of ยง1]
